mapper.select: SELECT T.*, S.STU_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME, S.STU_SSN AS BIRTHDAY FROM HD_STU_TUITION_TB T JOIN HD_STUDENT_TB S ON T.STU_NO=#{stuNo} AND T.STU_NO=S.STU_NO AND ACA_YEAR_SEM=#{acaYearSem} JOIN HD_DEPARTMENT_TB D ON S.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE

SELECT S.STU_NO, S.STU_NAME, S.STU_TEL, S.STU_ADDR, S.STU_EMAIL, D.DEPT_NAME, S.STU_SSN AS BIRTHDAY FROM (SELECT * FROM HD_STUDENT_TB WHERE STU_NO=#{studentNo}) S JOIN HD_DEPARTMENT_TB D ON S.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE
mapper.update: UPDATE HD_STU_TUITION_TB SET PAYMENT_STAT='Y', PAYMENT_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE STU_NO=#{stuNo} AND ACA_YEAR_SEM=#{acaYearSem}
UPDATE HD_STUDENT_TB SET STU_YEAR_SEM=#{stuYearSem} WHERE STU_NO=#{stuNo}
mapper.select: SELECT GC.*, S.STU_NAME, S.STU_SSN, D.DEPT_NAME FROM HD_GRADUATION_CON_TB GC JOIN HD_STUDENT_TB S ON S.STU_NO=#{studentNo} AND GC.STU_NO=S.STU_NO JOIN HD_DEPARTMENT_TB D ON S.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE
SELECT STU_YEAR_SEM FROM HD_STUDENT_TB WHERE STU_NO=#{studentNo}

SELECT S.SUB_YEAR||'-'||S.SUB_SEMESTER AS ACA_YEAR_SEM, S.SUB_NAME, S.SUB_DATE, S.SUB_TIME, S.SUB_ROOM, T.PROF_NAME FROM (SELECT SR.*, C.SUB_CODE, C.PROF_ID, P.PROF_NAME FROM (SELECT STU_NO, SUB_SEQ FROM HD_SUB_REQ_TB WHERE STU_NO=#{stuNo}) SR JOIN HD_CLASS_TB C ON SR.SUB_SEQ=C.SUB_SEQ JOIN HD_PROFESSOR_TB P ON C.PROF_ID=P.PROF_ID) T JOIN HD_SUBJECT_TB S ON S.SUB_SEQ=T.SUB_SEQ AND S.SUB_YEAR=#{acaYear} AND S.SUB_SEMESTER=#{acaSemester}

SELECT SR.STU_NO, SR.SUB_SEQ, S.SUB_NAME, S.SUB_CODE, S.SUB_YEAR, S.SUB_SEMESTER, S.SUB_DATE, S.SUB_TIME FROM (SELECT * FROM HD_SUB_REQ_TB WHERE STU_NO=#{stuNo}) SR JOIN HD_CLASS_TB C ON SR.SUB_SEQ=C.SUB_SEQ JOIN HD_SUBJECT_TB S ON SR.SUB_SEQ=S.SUB_SEQ AND S.SUB_YEAR=#{acaYear} AND S.SUB_SEMESTER=#{acaSemester}

SELECT S.SUB_NAME, AR.* FROM (SELECT * FROM HD_SUB_REQ_TB WHERE STU_NO=#{stuNo} AND SUB_SEQ=#{subSeq}) SR JOIN HD_CLASS_TB C ON SR.SUB_SEQ=C.SUB_SEQ JOIN HD_SUBJECT_TB S ON SR.SUB_SEQ=S.SUB_SEQ AND S.SUB_YEAR=#{acaYear} AND S.SUB_SEMESTER=#{acaSemester} JOIN HD_ASGMT_REGD_TB AR ON SR.SUB_SEQ=AR.SUB_SEQ ORDER BY ASGMT_REGD_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM HD_SUB_REQ_TB WHERE STU_NO=#{stuNo} AND SUB_SEQ=#{subSeq}) SR JOIN HD_CLASS_TB C ON SR.SUB_SEQ=C.SUB_SEQ JOIN HD_SUBJECT_TB S ON SR.SUB_SEQ=S.SUB_SEQ AND S.SUB_YEAR=#{acaYear} AND S.SUB_SEMESTER=#{acaSemester} JOIN HD_ASGMT_REGD_TB AR ON SR.SUB_SEQ=AR.SUB_SEQ

SELECT S.SUB_NAME, P.PROF_NAME, AR.* FROM (SELECT * FROM HD_SUB_REQ_TB WHERE STU_NO=#{stuNo} AND SUB_SEQ=#{subSeq}) SR JOIN HD_CLASS_TB C ON SR.SUB_SEQ=C.SUB_SEQ JOIN HD_PROFESSOR_TB P ON C.PROF_ID=P.PROF_ID JOIN HD_SUBJECT_TB S ON SR.SUB_SEQ=S.SUB_SEQ AND S.SUB_YEAR=#{acaYear} AND S.SUB_SEMESTER=#{acaSemester} JOIN HD_ASGMT_REGD_TB AR ON SR.SUB_SEQ=AR.SUB_SEQ AND AR.ASGMT_NO=${asgmtNo}
